node_2: list of accolades received by barfi!
edge: Barfi! has received various awards and nominations in categories ranging mostly from recognition of the film itself to its direction, screenplay, cinematography, music, to the cast's performances.
Barfi! received a leading 13 nominations at the 58th Filmfare Awards,
Barfi! won a leading 7 awards, including Best Film,
Barfi! won the award for Best Actor (Kapoor),
Barfi! won the award for Best Female Debut (D'Cruz),
Barfi! won the leading 7 awards, including Best Music Director (Pritam),
Barfi! received a leading 23 nominations at the 19th Screen Awards,
Barfi! won the award for Best Director (Basu),
Barfi! won the award for Best Actor (Kapoor),
Barfi! won Jodi No. 1 (Kapoor and Chopra),
Barfi! received 9 nominations at the 14th Zee Cine Awards,
Barfi! won the award for Best Film,
Barfi! won the award for Best Director (Basu),
